name: Wave of vengeance
description:
Robopost is an action arcade game with the capture of outposts.

The planet has been invaded by a legion of cyborgs from an enemy planet. All outposts necessary
to ensure the supply of resources are now under the control of the legion.
You need to free the planet from enemies by capturing territories and fighting off cyborgs.

The game is a game level where the player needs to capture outposts, repelling enemy attacks.
To complete the level, the player needs to capture all the outposts and not die.

To move, use the A and D buttons.
Hold W or Space to fly.
Click on the LMB to shoot.

Features:
- 50 different levels;
- Nice graphics;
- exciting gameplay.
